name: Achilles
description:
Achilles is a light, single player turn based sci-fi strategy game in a classic top-down board game style. Each game may take anywhere from five minutes to half an hour on average.

Features
  • Generate and save procedurally generated random maps
  • Force selection and random events allow players to customize each game
  • Six unique unit types with a variety of weapons and abilities
  • Choose Industrial, High Tech, Elite Military or Balanced force
  • In-game information reference

Game Play
  • Fog of war
  • Resource accumulation
  • New unit generation and repair/resupply
  • Choose victory by base capture/unit elimination, or point total
  • In-game documentation
